items.value: When Depth is  enabled on supported devices, virtual objects adapt to the environment by blending in with the real world.

In order to start the experience, the app needs to detect a flat, horizontal surface. 

Finding a surface works best on well-lit, textured surfaces like wood, concrete, tiles, and carpets. 

Aim down at the floor or a tabletop, and move your phone slowly in a circle. 

Make sure the lighting isn’t too dark or too bright.
Too dark. Try moving to a well-lit area.
Aim device at a surface with more texture or color.
Another app is using the camera. Tap on this app or try closing the other one.
Point your camera to where you want to place an object.
1. To rotate, zoom in, or zoom out a model, double-click on it./n/n2. To enable the AR menu, click and hold your finger on the model.
